name: Mini Daisy & Daisy Wild Gift Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:Charmingly simple with a signature quality, this Daisy perfume duo makes the perfect gift. The Daisy Eau de Toilette is optimistic, sophisticated, and irresistibly feminine. The adventurous, bold, and feminine Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum exudes a fresh femininity reminiscent of a wildflower bouquet, inspiring us to reconnect with nature and embody our young, free-spirited selves..This Set Contains:- 0.13 oz/ 4 mL Daisy Eau de Toilette (mini size)
ingredients: Daisy Eau de Toilette:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Itronellol, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Octocrylene, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Methyl 2-Octynoate, Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, BHT, FD&C Yellow No. 6 (CI15985), FD&C Yellow No. 5 (CI 19140). ..Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Linalool, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Alcohol, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Farnesol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Benzyl Benzoate, Methyl 2-Octynoate, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Eugenol, Isoeugenol, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Green 3 (CI 42053), Red 4 (CI 14700).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply fragrance behind your ears and on your wrists, inner elbows, and chest.

reviews.review_title: Marc Jacobs fragrances the best fresh and perfect!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re a fan of fresh, floral fragrances, this Marc Jacobs gift set is a perfect addition to your collection. The combination of the classic Daisy Eau de Toilette and the mini Daisy Wild is simply delightful. Both scents offer a soft, feminine, and playful vibe, with unique personalities that suit different moods or occasions.  The Daisy Eau de Toilette is light, clean, and charming, perfect for daily wear with its bright floral notes. The Daisy Wild Mini adds a slightly wilder twist, ideal for those who enjoy a slightly more daring yet still floral scent. Together, they make an excellent gift, whether for yourself or someone special.  The packaging is another standout feature. The colorful floral designs on the box are whimsical and festive, making it an ideal holiday gift. The mini size of Daisy Wild is also great for traveling or keeping in your bag for a quick refresh throughout the day.  Overall, if you’re looking for a versatile and beautiful fragrance set, this Marc Jacobs duo offers an elegant and playful experience that’s sure to please any floral fragrance lover!

reviews.review_title: The best scents that will last all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Umm where do I even begin? These two smell absolutely amazing. Me personally I feel a lot of perfumes tend to smell very grandmaish. These smell sexy and fresh! Also they last all day. I’m definitely getting in the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These perfumes are refreshing and hide in the summer. They are not very big and are convenient to take with you everywhere in your purse. This set is also suitable as a gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I took one star off solely for the fact that the bottle for Daisy had opened during transit and was empty. Thankfully Daisy Wild was fully closed because I absolutely love it! My go to scent for years what Daisy Love, however recently it just hasn’t been hitting quite the same, I’m assuming due to a change in taste. Wild though, is just what I was looking for! A slightly sweet and refreshing floral that feels a bit more lively and young at heart, yet still classy. The note that stands out the most to me is Jasmine but slightly tamed. I often find it hard to find floral based perfumes that don’t smell too “grandma” like. Lol This one is definitely a win! Also, can we have a moment for these bottles? They are so stinking cute and would make great gifts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this set for free in exchange for a review. But I’ve actually had Marc Jacobs Daisy before and I really like it. Because I like Daisy, I’ve been curious about the other scents. When I saw this mini set available, I was excited to try it out. The design and size of the bottles are really cute. I took a picture of the two perfume bottles with the Gucci Velvet Matte Lipstick for scale. The amount of product you get really allows you to really get a sense of whether you like it or not. They aren’t little spray bottles, but instead they are capped plug in which you remove to pour a little of the product out.  I really like the smell of Daisy, like a smooth classic sweet floral vanilla-y scent. Daisy Wild is similar but slightly sweeter and has a brighter note to it. I prefer Daisy but I also do like Daisy Wild. I just saw that I could try layering the two, so I may try that sometime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful floral scent. Not too overpowering either! This would make for a great stocking stuffer. The flowers for the bottles are SUPER cute, but the design and size feels a bit too awkward and bulky for me to carry around in my purse. But maybe that’s just me. Great product nonetheless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mini gift set! The floral scent lasts long and the amount of product seems like I will get a lot of use out of it. It’s a great travel size that I actually keep at my desk at work now. Perfect gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After testing these perfumes out they smells so fresh and clean I love the like spice they have to them on me like flowers at the Christmas dinner love it and small size fits in purse in the go or on a trip

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great gift set that allows for trial sizes of the scents if you wanna try it out. The wild scent is more floral and lighter while the daisy is more woodsier scent. Both great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent. My only complaint is the flower clover. Too bulky to put in my mini purse. But scent is amazing so still 5/5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of both of these are so lovely and the little bottles are adorable. However, one of mine came completely opened and spilled all over. So, as adorable as the bottles are the caps should be a bit more secure.

Marc Jacobs always appeals to me because of their fresh scents. Daisy Eau de Toilette is an optimistic, sophisticated and irresistibly feminine fragrance with a gorgeous packaging of large, proud white daisies. Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum is bolder but still feminine, giving me a fresh, floral bouquet. Most of their fragrances are youthful and perfect for any occasion because they have a great longevity. If you are looking for fresh scents that are naturally seductive, this is a must-try and the Daisy duo is the perfect gift for the upcoming holidays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Marc Jacobs Women’s 2 Piece Multiline Daisy Eau de Toilette and Daisy Wild Mini Holiday Gift Set, and I was charmed by its presentation and scents.   **Packaging and Size**   First off, the packaging is adorable. While the bottles are quite small, they’re perfect for gift-giving—think stocking stuffers or white elephant gifts for any perfume lover. The cute design makes them feel special, but due to their size, they serve better as samplers than practical travel options.   **Scent and Durability**   Now, onto the scents. Daisy, a classic favorite of mine, is a lovely powdery floral with citrus and fruity undertones. It’s versatile and perfect for spring and summer, though I noticed its durability wanes a bit if you’re on the go.   Daisy Wild was a delightful surprise for me. It leans more toward fruity notes while maintaining a floral essence. I appreciate that it lacks the powdery aspect, making it fresher and more vibrant. I found its scent to be quite durable, lasting through a busy day better than the original Daisy.  Overall, this set is a delightful gift option that offers a taste of two lovely fragrances, each with its own character. While they may not be the most practical for daily wear, their charm and scent make them a worthy addition to any fragrance collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this perfume for about a week. To me it smells like a light floral mixed with a woodsy scent. I received many compliments on it. I did notice that the scent last nearly all day. I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These two beautiful bottles pack so much goodness in them. These sense smell absolutely fantastic and are perfect for a gift for the holidays. I’ve always loved any of the Daisy sent and believe me you will not be disappointed with either one of these. I had a coworker stop and ask me what I was wearing and told me I smelled fantastic

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Marc Jacobs gift set is amazing! Both fragrances have such a sweet, fresh scent! Super easy to wear every day—like, I can throw it on for work or just hanging out, and it always feels right. The bottles are adorable too, which is a bonus. If you’re into soft, pretty perfumes that aren’t too overpowering, you’ll love this one!
